channel.title: Help Npc Help
channel.description: I dont think my server has npc combat, and i dont really want to add it people can train on players though. is it possible to make like a spammer that will only spam every 10 secs and will just walk to the pvp area saying "Train On ME!"? is this possible? if so how would i do it?

item.title: Help Npc Help
item.dc:creator: @red_arrow red arrow
item.description:
@red_arrow wrote:

I dont think my server has npc combat, and i dont really want to add it people can train on players though.
is it possible to make like a spammer that will only spam every 10 secs
and will just walk to the pvp area saying “Train On ME!”?
is this possible?
if so how would i do it?

Read full topic
